p.strong: Looking for more age-appropriate ideas for your Pre-K student while they're learning at home? Please visit the Georgia Department of Early Care and Learning (DECAL) website for fun activities and great family resources at www.decal.ga.gov. This website includes educational resources and activities divided into four categories including Storytime, Virtual Field Trips, Let's Go Outside, and Screen-Free Time and are based on the Georgia Early Learning and Development Standards (GELDS). Enjoy this precious time at home with your child and have some fun!
